description: The Red Mountain Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Red Mountain for the snow report
Alexa, ask Red Mountain for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Red Mountain Resort
shortDescription: The Red Mountain Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Red Mountain Resort.
